title: What music app uses the least battery? - Quora

response.answer_text: In this age of modernization and leading smart phone application giants, you'll most probably find many top rated musical apps that are very good in UI and controls are also very smooth but as far as my analysis I've been running real time experiments of apps power consumption, what I figured out is Play Music is soaring so far. The Play Music app is worth to use instead of the others. It is far more good for the phone battery.
